subject: Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
Shea Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The new cost for the best seats in Citi Field is a 79 percent increase over this year, but still shy of the $2,500 tickets at the new Yankee Stadium.
snippet: The new cost for the best seats in Citi Field is a 79 percent increase over this year, but still shy of the $2,500 tickets at the new Yankee Stadium.
